means: （使）发痒( tickle的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It tickled the hairs on the back of my neck.
sentence.Network_cn: 它挠得我后脖梗儿的绒毛直痒痒。

sentence.Network_en: "I'm tickled pink," said Jimmy after his wife gave birth.
sentence.Network_cn: “我太开心了，”吉米在妻子分娩后说。

sentence.Network_en: They all sounded just as tickled.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们听起来好像都很愉快。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 年轻女郎在挤拥的地铁车厢化妆的情景，时常令我发笑（tickled）。Robot解机械人，模仿人类行为的机器，日本人擅长制造机械人。
美剧随身听《生活大爆炸》... ... whatever： 不管怎样的 tickled： 使…快乐 undergo： 经历，经受.
They tickled his vanity by praising his work ., 他们赞扬他的工作以搔到他虚荣的 ? 处.
He was tickled to death at the news ., 听到那消息他高兴得要死.

entry.def: When you tickle someone, you move your fingers lightly over a sensitive part of their body, often in order to make them laugh.

example.ex: I was tickling him, and he was laughing and giggling.
example.tran: 我在胳肢他，他哈哈哈、咯咯咯地笑个不停。

entry.def: If something tickles you or tickles, it causes an irritating feeling by lightly touching a part of your body.

example.ex: ...a yellow hat with a great feather that tickled her ear...
example.tran: 上面有根大羽毛、搞得她耳朵很痒的一顶黄色礼帽

example.ex: A beard doesn't scratch, it just tickles.
example.tran: 下巴上的胡子不刮人，就是叫人痒痒。

entry.def: If a fact or a situation tickles you, it amuses you or gives you pleasure.

example.ex: It tickles me to see him riled...
example.tran: 看见他生气我就觉得忍俊不禁。

example.ex: The story was really funny — it tickled me.
example.tran: 那个故事真有趣——笑死我了。

entry.def: If you are tickled pink, you are extremely pleased about something.

example.ex: 'I'm tickled pink,' said Jimmy after his wife gave birth.
example.tran: “我太开心了，”吉米在妻子分娩后说。

auth_sentence.content: I see clown fish being gleefully tickled by anemones.
auth_sentence.res_content: I see clown fish being gleefully tickled by anemones.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I see clown fish being gleefully tickled by anemones.

auth_sentence.content: Your man Charles Darwin would be tickled pink.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your man Charles Darwin would be tickled pink.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your man Charles Darwin would be tickled pink.

auth_sentence.content: They also chirped more than their older relatives when tickled.
auth_sentence.res_content: They also chirped more than their older relatives when tickled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They also chirped more than their older relatives when tickled.
